seniority_level.evidence: Job posting states Total Experience 6-7 years (Relevant 4-5 years), which aligns with senior‑level expectations.

job_family.evidence: Title and responsibilities focus on data gathering, storage, batch and real‑time processing, ETL pipelines, and Azure Databricks.

sub_specialty.evidence: The description emphasizes building pipelines, ETL tools, and both batch and real‑time processing, with strong mention of Azure Databricks and Spark for batch workloads.

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people‑management responsibilities or direct reports; role is focused on technical delivery.

primary_cloud.evidence: Must‑have skills list includes Azure Databricks, Azure DevOps, Azure Blob; all are Azure services.

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud providers are referenced in the posting or extracted skills.

processing_paradigm.evidence: The role mentions both batch and real‑time processing of data.

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools such as Airflow, Luigi, Dagster, Prefect, or cloud‑native schedulers are cited.

storage_layer.evidence: Azure Databricks (Delta Lake) and Azure Blob storage imply a lakehouse architecture.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location restriction is Bengaluru East, Karnataka, India and work model is onsite.

timezone_focus.evidence: Job is based in India, which falls in the APAC region.

relocation_required.evidence: Posting does not mention any relocation requirement; it expects candidates to be based in Bengaluru.

h1b_friendly.evidence: Visa sponsorship is listed as not_mentioned and the role is India‑based.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No reference to OPT/CPT or student visa support.

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work‑authorization restrictions are stated.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: The role is described as a full‑time position at IBM with no contract type specified, implying a standard employee (W2) arrangement.

benefits_level.evidence: Pass 1 extraction shows no benefits listed.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: The posting does not discuss career ladders, promotion tracks, or growth pathways.

mentorship_signals.evidence: No explicit or implied mentorship programs are referenced.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No language about promotions or advancement is present.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: The posting does not mention internal transfers or mobility options.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career track options (IC, management, specialist, architect) are described.

requirement_strictness.evidence: Must‑have list includes many specific Azure and programming skills plus 6‑7 years of experience.

scope_definition.evidence: Job description is focused on data engineering responsibilities without mixing other roles.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Required skill set aligns with a senior data engineer role given the 6‑7 years of experience.
